name: Business KPI Reporting Dashboard
author: N Squared

sections.description:
BlinkMetrics brings all your website data (and data from other SaaS tools you use to run your business) into one single source of truth. This plugin lets you bring all your WordPress data into BlinkMetrics (requires an active account on https://blinkmetrics.io)

Getting Started

To begin exposing data to BlinkMetrics:

  1. Navigate to Tools > Blink Metrics in your WordPress admin area.
  2. Choose the specific metrics you’d like to make accessible to BlinkMetrics and generate an API key.
  3. Add your website as a data source within BlinkMetrics, providing the API key that you generated in step 2.

Business KPI Reporting Dashboard is not just a tool for internal reporting but also a gateway to broader data utilization and external service enhancements.
sections.faq:
I have a question or need help with the plugin, how do I contact your support team?

To contact our support team, submit your message through our WordPress support forum. Or, you can also submit your message through our website’s Contact page.

How do I create an API key for my WordPress site?

After activating the plugin:

  • Navigate to Tools > Blink Metrics in your WordPress admin area.
  • Select the metrics you wish to track.
  • Click Generate API Key and copy the provided credentials.

How do I make a simple KPI report from my WordPress data?

After installing this plugin, paste the generated API key into your BlinkMetrics account. Then just select the metrics that you want to see in your report.

The settings page where you can select which metrics to expose and generate your unique API Key.
